forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
